website_summaries.verdict: A recent update makes The Weather Channel a strong player among weather apps for Android.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I like this app, as it is accurate, I always check it after the evening weather on TV, the reason I have it four stars is because the weather map is set in April 30 th, so you are either early for this year or still on last year, otherwise a very good app.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Cox

customer_reviews.title: As good as 💫
customer_reviews.text: As far as weather apps go, this is pretty reliable. None can be a 100% but this one always as accurate as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica G. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Weather App
customer_reviews.text: Accurate weather reports includes map radar to show pending weather.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Quite a good app
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it a lot but it seems more accurate than some others. The only thing that gets on my nerves is the adverts at the bottom of the screen, but they annoy me on other things too. The area are at least at the bottom of the screen whereas some cover the content of what you are trying to read which is really irritating. I know we have to have adds but why so many.
customer_reviews.author: julie mycock

customer_reviews.title: My 'go to' weather app.
customer_reviews.text: Although the Android 9+ version for my Kindle is slightly different and unfamiliar, I find the Weather Channel to be the most accurate and localised app for weather, so this is worth persevering with. The mobile version is great if locations are turned on, as it is so specific and current; overall a very reliable service.
customer_reviews.author: M. Williams

customer_reviews.title: I have used this app for the last three years ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used this app for the last three years on my tablet. Having restored my tab to factory status to relieve too many demands on memory, I now need to reinstall the program. When trying to load it using the tablet I get a message saying that it can only be downloaded to a PC and if I try to download to my PC I am told that I must download it direct to my android device. Catch 22 situation!!! So far, I have been unable to re-install the program to my tablet so from 5 stars previously to 3 stars now - assuming that I might be able to get it installed. Ken
customer_reviews.author: K.G.B.

customer_reviews.title: Accurate.
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant weather app, would highly recommend it It is very accurate most of the time. It gives you a lot of information and maps as you go further down the page. Love it. Stumcc
customer_reviews.author: Stuart McClements

customer_reviews.title: Good Overview
customer_reviews.text: Great app. Clear graphics with good overviews for each day as well as summaries for week ahead and next 15 days. Moving satellite data gives clear guidance to up and coming weather patterns and information on likely rain and snowfall depths is very useful
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good weather app
customer_reviews.text: Tried several apps but find this one the most accurate and comprehensive for weather information. Easy app to operate.
customer_reviews.author: Richie R

customer_reviews.title: Accurate
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy using this weather app, I think it is the most accurate one I have used so far, I would say it's around 95% accurate for my region
customer_reviews.author: suzanm

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Love the Weather Channel most times it is very accurate ,love reading the stories about the Weather around the world highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: suezieq

customer_reviews.title: Exce?lent App
customer_reviews.text: Love using it.Easy to follow. Full of intetesting topid. Very accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hail, rain or shine.
customer_reviews.text: It'll keep you up to date with weather everywhere....your own location and all the rest. Since we love moaning about our weather, go look at everyone else's.
customer_reviews.author: Michael McKinlay

customer_reviews.title: It just works!
customer_reviews.text: I just love apps that do what they claim to do!
customer_reviews.author: Les

customer_reviews.title: I deleted from my device. Should have read the ...
customer_reviews.text: I deleted from my device. Should have read the reviews before downloading Couldn't get it to work and it said it was 23○ yesterday when I put my area in !!
customer_reviews.author: Moira

customer_reviews.title: Good app
customer_reviews.text: Like this app very easy to read and very accurate would recommend it
customer_reviews.author: linda edwards

customer_reviews.title: good little app
customer_reviews.text: I have that many weather apps and they're pretty much the same, giving much the same information, which is encouraging. I think this one makes it all the nicer because it's pretty and bright, easy to read and use. Gave it 4 stars because it doesn't look 10 days ahead but no big deal as I don't think the met weather can look that far ahead anyway and give accurate information!! Just wish it could forecast sun everyday
customer_reviews.author: mrs d

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I have this app on my kindle and on my phone and it looks really nice it's easy to use and great for checking the weather if you're at home or going somewhere on holiday. You can have it set up to loads of different locations and it gives you 10 days worth of forecasts, it at not always be correct but neither is the weather report on the tv. On my kindle.fire it brings up clear.concise pictures and looks the part, well worth downloading.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: by Ginny P
customer_reviews.text: Clear, simple to use. Idea for local area and checking other parts of the country, great if your going away and want to check the place you're staying. Pictures are good handy for those with pollen allergies. Also gives you temperatures throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: easy to use, good overall picture of the future, very prompt when searching new locations.
customer_reviews.author: biblioraptor

customer_reviews.title: only useful for outside temperature
customer_reviews.text: A 'Fun' item, only useful for outside temperature, and then not accurate for local temp
customer_reviews.author: DDB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well as an app but is no better than other forecasters
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer PS10

customer_reviews.title: Great app with only one problem
customer_reviews.text: This superb app allows access to accurate weather details for anywhere in the world. It is also very easy to use. The only reason it doesn't get 5 stars is that my saved locations keep disappearing. I have to re-save them every couple of days. The same thing happens on my phone, so it's a problem with the app rather than my tablet. Overall, still worth downloading.
customer_reviews.author: Silver Scorpion

customer_reviews.title: good app
customer_reviews.text: This is my favourite weather app ( and I have a few! ) It looks good is easy to navigate and is pretty accurate. All in all good value for a free app.
customer_reviews.author: sparkle pink

customer_reviews.title: Excellent application
customer_reviews.text: I find the weather channel application to be excellent. It loads quickly and is very informative both for today and the next ten days.
customer_reviews.author: John Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Weather
customer_reviews.text: Ok app but a lot of adds flash up disrupting the app
customer_reviews.author: june

customer_reviews.title: Sunny periods possible!
customer_reviews.text: A good app but could do with simplifying the user interface. I prefer a detailed summary screen but you don't really get this. I have resorted to putting the widget on my Nexus 7 front screen so if I want more detail then I can click on it and then explore the full app. You don't have to be a weather geek to appreciate the full extent of info from this app. I do prefer it just, over AccuWeather.
customer_reviews.author: The Ringmer Gooner

customer_reviews.title: Accurate App
customer_reviews.text: Love The Weather Channel. It's accurate - almost to the hour - clear and easy to navigate. Wherever you are you can check the weather anywhere in the world with a 10 day forecast, which is great for planning what to pack in your suitcase!
customer_reviews.author: M. Emery

customer_reviews.title: do not change for change sake!
customer_reviews.text: Why have they changed this weather app? It was fine as it was and it is not an improvement . Like so many things on kindle change for changesake is happening all too often. Please stop and think.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: very handy
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good app altogether. Whilst the forecast can be a bit off, I find the map with the predicted rainfall quite accurate. Also like the fact you can add several locations so I can see what the weather is doing where various loved-ones live
customer_reviews.author: Happy reader

customer_reviews.title: I have been pleased with this app as it allows me to follow ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been pleased with this app as it allows me to follow the weather abroad as well as at home so I can see what the weather is doing in Alicante where my sister lives, also the pictures which come up with the information are quite stunning.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Relaible
customer_reviews.text: This seems fairly accurate and reliable so far. Lots of information on a little screen, about as much as you'll want to know without putting your head outside the door. But you can get a clue as to what the weather will be later in the day or early next morning which can be helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Jayne

customer_reviews.title: To early
customer_reviews.text: I have only just got it so cannot give a review on it but it looks as though it is a good one.
customer_reviews.author: D Birkert

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best app I've had very accurate up to date very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: mrs sandra catchpole

customer_reviews.title: Keep up to date
customer_reviews.text: A good weather map to find out the weather were gonna get
customer_reviews.author: Graham Jay

customer_reviews.title: I really didn't believe it ...
customer_reviews.text: A simple download, enter your postcode and you get your own personal weather forecast straight onto your Kindle or Android. It is so accurate I rely on it totally. At first I expected little of it, but now I trust it completely and thoroughly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Auntie Jan

customer_reviews.title: One of the better weather apps
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, pictorial view of the weather location via GPS on your phone.Ought to be included as standard build. Not that you change the weather but you can at least see what is coming in the ext hour or 2.
customer_reviews.author: David PM Young

customer_reviews.title: Gardener's corner
customer_reviews.text: I find this channel the most accurate and accessible there is. As a gardener it's important to have good reports that are reliable.
customer_reviews.author: "bernadetteideas"

customer_reviews.title: Whether to or not
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bonus for me, I can plan whether to hang my washing out or not and when I'm going out I know if I need to take my umbrella or not. It is a very useful addition to my collection.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good and accurate. Easy to read. We enjoy it, it's the best.
customer_reviews.author: M. Jones

customer_reviews.title: app won't open
customer_reviews.text: Widget loaded, set for my location but - app doesn't open, it tells me that it has stopped working - I have deleted this app. Give me the Met office app any day, . . . oh yeh, it isn't available on amazone app store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Weather App for kindle
customer_reviews.text: This App is brilliant I use it every day especially as we are going on holiday. I check the weather for the next ten days in the location we are traveling to. So far it has been very accurate as well as being fun. It gives different conditions such as wind strength and direction which is very handy as one day on holiday we are going sailing on a boat. Would highly recommend giving this a go.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs P M Scott

customer_reviews.title: Like it very much.
customer_reviews.text: I follow the weather every day, this is a very good insight to the weather.
customer_reviews.author: Tommo

customer_reviews.title: Nice clear no nonsense forecasts
customer_reviews.text: Lovely graphics, easy quick glance forecasts. Found them pretty accurate up till now on the 36 hour option. '10 day' gives a good idea of how the week might go, of course it is likely to change but then any forecaster is restricted in the same way.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Weather eye
customer_reviews.text: Having downloaded this I app I find it very useful and look at it most days. Informative and easy to understand would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Percival

customer_reviews.title: Usefull
customer_reviews.text: App is easy to look at and pretty accurate as weather prediction can be
customer_reviews.author: Jec

customer_reviews.title: Accurate!
customer_reviews.text: This is a truly accurate app for forecasting the weather. It even gives you the probability of rain, which is much better than the simple cloud symbol you get on the BBC's weather app.
customer_reviews.author: Leon

customer_reviews.title: Weather app
customer_reviews.text: Good. Easy to switch from one lo action to another
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: brilliant
customer_reviews.text: I liked that I could enter my location easily and have the option to enter other locations. The options are good including now, hourly, 3 day and 10 day forecasts. So far it's been accurate as well. And it's free. What more could you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Talbot

customer_reviews.title: Really reliable weather app
customer_reviews.text: This app is always reliable, often to the hour. Thoroughly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Sarah C. Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and useful app
customer_reviews.text: ONE of the best weather apps, that I have tried. I like the images to match the weather. But I think the ten day forecast is not very accurate. Considering meteorology is not an exact science it is decent educated guess work.
customer_reviews.author: Robinl15

customer_reviews.title: Great app
customer_reviews.text: I look at this app nearly every day cos I travel a lot and find it really useful.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Weather Channel
customer_reviews.text: It seemed a good App, but you always need to have a connection for the app to work. No good if you are in the middle of no where and need to know the weather report.
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Powney

customer_reviews.title: So easy
customer_reviews.text: I find this app so easy to use and so helpful as I can plan trips to other places. with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: lin

customer_reviews.title: Great worthwhile weather App
customer_reviews.text: Great app. All the information that you want about weather conditions in any area of your choosing. Results can be broken down into right now, hourly, 36 hours or 10 day forecast. Other features include severe weather warnings and pollen alerts.
customer_reviews.author: MS ANNIS M PAUL

customer_reviews.title: Love the radar
customer_reviews.text: It's the best weather app I have used. I find the radar particularly useful.
customer_reviews.author: Griffy Manchester

customer_reviews.title: Fab app
customer_reviews.text: A clear and easy to understand app. The original app that I downloaded was good but it was upgraded a couple of days ago and its now even better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Weather Website
customer_reviews.text: This website is the best by far for both current weather reports and up to ten days forecast. There may be more in-depth information on the Met. Office site and good ones on the BBC, but I can't think when I last needed that...it's also the best looking site. In fact, for looks it's among the top five to grace my Kindle Fire!
customer_reviews.author: Mike F

customer_reviews.title: very clear
customer_reviews.text: very clear, easy to see a week in advance (of course if any forecast is that accurate). Suitable for my kindle, as can be viewed anywhere there is Wi-Fi you can connect with
customer_reviews.author: Ann Beattie

customer_reviews.title: The Weather Channel - great App
customer_reviews.text: All of us on our planet are interested in the weather. The Weather Channel app I find is the most comprehensive compared to others.
customer_reviews.author: G. Coles

customer_reviews.title: Weater forecast
customer_reviews.text: Great hour by hour weather of town all over uk
customer_reviews.author: hits

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Found this very difficult to find my way around. It would not recognise my location and when I put in my postcode it listed it as another town. Wanted to find out temperatures in other countries, but gave up as I was getting nowhere. Didn't seem to have any links to other pages. Will not bother with it any more and will uninstall.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: ideal apt.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very reliable source of vital information. This was true during the flooding for all travellers and all those affected by the awful weather.
customer_reviews.author: a photographer

customer_reviews.title: accurate and reliable
customer_reviews.text: I have used this app at home and when travelling and it hasn't let me down yet! I particularly like the hourly breakdown from which you can decide on whether or not to take your brolly and/or your sunscreen.
customer_reviews.author: c askew

customer_reviews.title: This is great
customer_reviews.text: I can thoroughly recommend this app. It gives a very accurate forecast of the hourly weather and a pretty reliable forecast further into the future.
customer_reviews.author: W Manley

customer_reviews.title: Weather channel review
customer_reviews.text: I use it constantly as I find it invaluable when planning my golf programme a week ahead. It is as accurate as can be in this part of the country which is notoriously difficult to forecast .
customer_reviews.author: jimboy

customer_reviews.title: Good weather!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent forecasts and looks good too. Easy to navigate and constantly updated. Other locations can be added which is really useful when travelling. Definitely recommend getting this app.
customer_reviews.author: Susan F

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well
customer_reviews.text: Mostly relIable in the short term but less so medium to long term. I don't blame the app - I blame the forecasters. It's time they were getting this right.
customer_reviews.author: Essem

customer_reviews.title: brilliant app!
customer_reviews.text: This app is perfect if you want to find out the weather on your kindle. It's such a simple app to navigate and gives accurate forecasts and since the update I think it's even better! Best weather app on the app store in my opinion :)
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Just The Job
customer_reviews.text: It gives you the weather straight forward and the ten day ahead system is of great help when planning also the ability to change location
customer_reviews.author: John Austin

customer_reviews.title: Weather.
customer_reviews.text: Good game to play I enjoy the simplicity of it.
customer_reviews.author: Sue T.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Clear text, and buttons. various outlooks from hourly to 10day forecasts. Can set-up and store multiple locations Note : Obviously Need the Kindle's 'wireless' function turned on.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very good maps so you can pinpoint where you are. Good forecasts for several days to enable you to plan visits to other areas. All in all a very useful app even better that it's free.
customer_reviews.author: lacelady

customer_reviews.title: great app.
customer_reviews.text: Love this app, living on an island, so important to have an accurate weather forecast. We depend on it for all types of travel example, fog, high winds Tec.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Ingram

customer_reviews.title: Works well on all devices
customer_reviews.text: Used for years on BlackBerry and now on Android and works just as well. The best weather app by far.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Not sure about this. It gives all the info you want, but isn't very user friendly, or all that pleasant to look at compared to others? Maybe its just me?
customer_reviews.author: vicaa

customer_reviews.title: great app for instant accurate information
customer_reviews.text: I took a while to get used to the new layout and format, but this is a great app for up to date weather information, more accurate than the BBC! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey

customer_reviews.title: REASONABLE
customer_reviews.text: Wanted something with a little more content than what I had already downloaded, still deciding wether to keep it. Reasonable so far.
customer_reviews.author: babs rostron

customer_reviews.title: weather channel
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fabulous was a free app however I would happily buy it. It starting point is the street that you live, gives 10 day forecast. I use it daily.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Grayson

customer_reviews.title: A great Weather Channel
customer_reviews.text: A great Weather Channel. In my opinion the best, full of information. Much better than the one on the Kindle Fire .
customer_reviews.author: BURCOMBE

customer_reviews.title: very good for the week ahead
customer_reviews.text: Very useful and a very good display of the weather for not only the day but the week.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie penfold

customer_reviews.title: accurate and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant app. Works well easy to use and seems accurate. Also can look at the weather worldwide so useful for holidays. Definitely one of the best weather apps. .
customer_reviews.author: jobel

customer_reviews.title: good app
customer_reviews.text: Handy to keep abreast weather especially when travelling Have been watching weather trends recently as will be travelling In Europe
customer_reviews.author: Lesley Benrimoj

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and up to date
customer_reviews.text: Good easy to use and customize app. Fairly accurate and handy. Easy to get localized weather as well as countrywide predictions. Used on a daily basis.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DON'T GO WITHOUT IT.
customer_reviews.text: I would give this app 10 out of 5. Simple to install and use. I have three locations added and it works well and updates regularly. Well recommended.
customer_reviews.author: 3jags

customer_reviews.title: Handy to have.
customer_reviews.text: Having this portable weather channel is ideal if you want to do something and are not sure whether it's going to rain, snow or shine. Always well worth a look.
customer_reviews.author: Silversally

customer_reviews.title: Long range forecast offers later dates
customer_reviews.text: This has allowed me to look up forecasts for approx. 2 weeks ahead, so I can plan when to visit an area in the UK with the best chance of less rain.
customer_reviews.author: J Popp

customer_reviews.title: Great app
customer_reviews.text: One of the best phone apps for the weather. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: jenny

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Reason for deleting a star, Home screen kept defaulting to a different location and defied my best efforts to change the deault.
customer_reviews.author: J. Baker

customer_reviews.title: weather channel app
customer_reviews.text: Great app put all your favourite destinations on and at a glance see different temps and forecasts and app is free what more,would you want
customer_reviews.author: Lesley

customer_reviews.title: clear & informative
customer_reviews.text: I found this a good, clear and informative source. It enables me to obtain localized and detailed up to date forecasts
customer_reviews.author: thevanmann

customer_reviews.title: Weather app
customer_reviews.text: Love this app. It gives the weather in a visual moving format as well as in symbols and words. Will change from C to F easily and forecast can be set to your destination or home
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: brilliant
customer_reviews.text: brilliant forecast for every hour of the day and days in advance
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: Really good - can customise for holiday destinations too
customer_reviews.text: I think this app is brilliant - you can put in many locations and see what the weather is like all over the world. Its good with the maps too, so it fulfills several functions.
customer_reviews.author: Graham  Buckle

customer_reviews.title: best in class
customer_reviews.text: More accurate and easier to use than other weather apps. The warnings work well and are helpful. Just a really useful to have app.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great app
customer_reviews.text: I really like this app.I haven't had any problems with it and it always loads quickly. I have been able to store a list of my favourite places, so that every morning I can see not only what the weather will be doing at home but where my family live and where I am due to be going on holiday abroad.
customer_reviews.author: suzy

customer_reviews.title: OK for daily view but videos and other material is usually out of sync/date
customer_reviews.text: Weirdly this weather channel Android app is no where as good as the one they have on Apple.
customer_reviews.author: Big Nissan

customer_reviews.title: Accurate
customer_reviews.text: This is, quite simply, one of the most accurate weather apps there is, no weather app is 100% accurate but this is much better than most.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Joynes

customer_reviews.title: good app
customer_reviews.text: Despite it changing dramatically after download, it's easy to use and has lots more locations than the other app I have. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel James

customer_reviews.title: weather app
customer_reviews.text: I think this is great app good and accurate i use it most days and also check where my friends and family are i like to know if i havr got better weather than them or not definitely best one i found
customer_reviews.author: kathleen smith
